attributes.action: Remove Alistair Darling and Jackie Smith from the cabinet NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many reasons to remove them - Too many to mention, They have abused their positions are only interested in looking after themselves - Follow Darling on Twitter and see him prove it.

Tabloid snipes aside, BOTH these Supposed Politicians have failed to offer any useful policies and have bought our country to its knees... SACK THEM NOW! NO PENSION! NO HANDSHAKE! OUT!

rejection.details:
Your petition overlaps with this existing petition http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/DismissSmith/ 
Please rewrite your petition, removing the overlapping content.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
